articles.title: Incredibly Rare 520-Million-Year-Old Worm Fossil Solves Ancient Evolutionary Mystery - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Durham University researchers discovered an extraordinarily detailed 520-million-year-old fossil, Youti yuanshi, revealing significant evolutionary insights into early arthropods’ complex anatomy and development. A recent study conducted by researchers at Dur…

articles.title: Google pulls Gemini AI ad from Olympics after backlash - The Verge
articles.description: Google pulls its “Dear Sydney” Olympics ad that shows a father using Gemini to write a heartfelt letter for his daughter.
